content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: low volatility (Vol: 14.8%) with broad participation (Breadth: 7/8). Market tone bullish and risk-on.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Energy & Chemicals ABOVE TREND: Energy & Chemicals (1W: +6.74% | 1M: +11.34%) and Banking & Finance ABOVE TREND: Banking & Finance (1W: +6.09% | 1M: +11.24%) are driving the rally.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Retail & Food CORRECTION: Retail & Food (1W: -1.67% | 1M: +17.31%) is the lone soft spot, showing short-term profit-taking despite strong monthly gains.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
GUBRF (1W: +22.56% | 1M: +28.35%) ABOVE TREND; HALKB (1W: +10.29% | 1M: +21.48%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +25.67%) ABOVE TREND; OYAKC (1W: +7.81% | 1M: +12.67%) ABOVE TREND; VAKBN (1W: +7.36% | 1M: +15.18%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
ULKER (1W: -5.01% | 1M: +17.93%) CORRECTION; CCOLA (1W: -4.79% | 1M: +19.19%) CORRECTION; KONTR (1W: -3.96% | 1M: -18.16%) BELOW TREND; MGROS (1W: -3.23% | 1M: +16.60%) CORRECTION; BIMAS (1W: -2.86% | 1M: +13.86%) CORRECTION.

6. Momentum Stocks?
High-momentum winners: GUBRF (1W: +22.56% | 1M: +28.35%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +10.29% | 1M: +21.48%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +25.67%) ABOVE TREND; watch for mean-reversion on the largest moves.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banking ABOVE TREND: AKBNK (1W: +5.27% | 1M: +12.88%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +4.49% | 1M: +7.15%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +7.19% | 1M: +10.79%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +10.29% | 1M: +21.48%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +7.36% | 1M: +15.18%) ABOVE TREND — sector leadership intact, earnings and NIM cadence the next drivers.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy/Industrial mixed but constructive: EREGL (1W: +3.84% | 1M: +12.00%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +4.69% | 1M: +22.21%) ABOVE TREND, FROTO (1W: -0.28% | 1M: +10.11%) CORRECTION, ASELS (1W: -2.75% | 1M: +33.85%) CORRECTION — rotation into cyclicals continues, but select profit-taking visible.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy & Chemicals ABOVE TREND: TRMET (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +25.67%) ABOVE TREND, GUBRF (1W: +22.56% | 1M: +28.35%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: +1.48% | 1M: +20.11%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +6.72% | 1M: +18.47%) ABOVE TREND — sector leadership broad-based and momentum-driven.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk-on stance: overweight Banking & Energy names and selective cyclicals; trim positions on extreme one-week winners and reduce exposure to Retail names showing short-term corrections. Keep cash for policy or macro-driven volatility spikes.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
GUBRF (1W: +22.56% | 1M: +28.35%) ABOVE TREND for momentum and profit-taking risk; HALKB (1W: +10.29% | 1M: +21.48%) ABOVE TREND on bank flows; TRMET (1W: +9.49% | 1M: +25.67%) ABOVE TREND as quant favorite; TCELL (1W: +6.52% | 1M: +16.55%) ABOVE TREND for tech momentum.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Energy & Chemicals and Banking & Finance for continuation; monitor Retail & Food for potential mean-reversion trades.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch XU100 near-term technical support at the 50-day moving average and a breakout above recent swing highs for extension; key catalysts: CBRT commentary, domestic CPI print, Q4 earnings, and FX moves that could flip risk sentiment.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
RISK-ON market: low volatility (14.8%) and strong breadth (7/8 sectors positive) favor cyclicals and banks. Priority is overweight Energy and Banking, trim stretched winners and monitor Retail for short-term reversals and macro/policy shocks.
